alert.note: Alert for Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 30 at 6:28AM PDT until July 30 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY THROUGH THIS EVENING... .Breezy winds continue through this evening combined with humidities in the teens for portions of the forecast area. The combination of hot and dry weather and gusty winds will result in red flag conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE OR642... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 642 Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts around 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Fires that develop will spread rapidly where strong winds occur. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
